title.narrative: Georgia: Building the Capacity of the Parliament of Georgia in Conducting Post-Legislative Scrutiny

description.narrative: With funding from USAID, WFD works to support the Healthcare and environment committees in the Parliament of Georgia. The programme helps the committees to undertake post-legislative scrutiny (PLS) to review laws and assess the extent to which the laws are achieving their intended outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: United States Agency for International Development (USAID)
